amendment.description: Amendment sought to raise the FHA down payment requirement from 3.5% to 5% and to prohibit closing costs from being rolled in as well.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-503 to raise the FHA down payment requirement from 3.5% to 5% and prohibit closing costs from being rolled in as well.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 289 (Roll no. 348).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 289 (Roll no. 348).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
